entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard developing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
